## LogProvider.log() method

Use to record information

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript

```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  logLevel | [LogLevel](./teamsfx-api.loglevel.md) | Defines logging severity levels. |
|  message | string | Information of log event |
